themes: Recognition of legacy and emerging organizations
Value of continuity and institutional knowledge
Need for stability and predictable funding
Advance notice of policy or budget changes
Balancing support for diversity and tradition
key_phrases: recognize the value of both legacy and emerging arts organizations
Longstanding organizations provide essential continuity, community trust, and institutional knowledge
need stability—especially in the form of predictable, transparent funding structures
advance notice of any major policy or budget shifts
fostering diversity and innovation in the arts
deep value built over time by cultural leaders
barriers_identified: Lack of predictable, transparent funding structures
Insufficient advance notice of major policy or budget shifts
solutions_proposed: Give advance notice of any major policy or budget shifts
Recognize and support both legacy and emerging organizations
